channel.title: Comments on: Vegetable Burgers with Chilli Mayo

item.title: By: kings lynn
item.dc:creator: kings lynn
item.description: Wow, that looks really good. I think I would eat it. Not so sure about the toddler he is so picky lately but that looks really good.
item.content:encoded: Wow, that looks really good. I think I would eat it. Not so sure about the toddler he is so picky lately but that looks really good.

item.title: By: Carissa
item.dc:creator: Carissa
item.description: Delicious!! I made them for my husband and he LOVED them! He keeps wanting me to make them again.
item.content:encoded: Delicious!! I made them for my husband and he LOVED them! He keeps wanting me to make them again.

item.title: By: Carissa
item.dc:creator: Carissa
item.description: Delicious!!! I made them and my husband LOVED them!!
item.content:encoded: Delicious!!! I made them and my husband LOVED them!!

item.title: By: Ricky @ Cookie Recipes
item.dc:creator: Ricky @ Cookie Recipes
item.description: I love the idea of a burger made of chickpeas. Haven't seen that yet, and I subscribe to a lot of food blogs. Nice idea! And sweet potato chips look like the perfect side too.
item.content:encoded: I love the idea of a burger made of chickpeas. Haven’t seen that yet, and I subscribe to a lot of food blogs. Nice idea! And sweet potato chips look like the perfect side too.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: With chickpeas and sweet potato they must be good! You're right that they'd be a great backup in the freezer, but I guess that might make them even more fragile.
item.content:encoded: With chickpeas and sweet potato they must be good! You’re right that they’d be a great backup in the freezer, but I guess that might make them even more fragile.

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: what a great recipe, I'm yet to try it but I'm recently in love with chickpeas. I might pass this onto my colleague who's a vegetarian so I'm sure she will love this!!
item.content:encoded: what a great recipe, I’m yet to try it but I’m recently in love with chickpeas. I might pass this onto my colleague who’s a vegetarian so I’m sure she will love this!!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: The last time I made a veggie burger, it fell completely apart in the pan. It was good, but it stopped me from trying again. Perhaps this is common. I like the ingredients in yours and am tempted to try again. (Are those sweet potato fries I see? Yum!)
item.content:encoded:
The last time I made a veggie burger, it fell completely apart in the pan. It was good, but it stopped me from trying again. Perhaps this is common. I like the ingredients in yours and am tempted to try again.
(Are those sweet potato fries I see? Yum!)

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: These burgers were delicious and I would highly recommend them to anyone. They would be a great choice for anyone who is vegetarian. Great pictures Anita!!!!!
item.content:encoded:
These burgers were delicious and I would highly recommend them to anyone. They would be a great choice for anyone who is vegetarian.
Great pictures Anita!!!!!

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: I once bought veggie burger 'mince' that basically consisted of refried beans. I don't know how the manufacturers got the consistency to be firmer, but when these were fried they had a crisp outer layer and a soft middle. I've liked them better than any other veggie patty I've tried. Unfortunately I've never seen them again.
item.content:encoded: I once bought veggie burger ‘mince’ that basically consisted of refried beans. I don’t know how the manufacturers got the consistency to be firmer, but when these were fried they had a crisp outer layer and a soft middle. I’ve liked them better than any other veggie patty I’ve tried. Unfortunately I’ve never seen them again.
